structure.unit: ARTICLE XII. PUBLIC AND BUS PASSENGER BENCHES AND SHELTERS

law.catch_line: Exemption of signs from zoning requirements.

text.section:
Sec. 21-169. Exemption of signs from zoning requirements.
Signs affixed to bus shelters and bus passenger benches placed at MDTA authorized bus stops and extending onto private property are exempt from the provisions of of the Code of Miami-Dade County.
